favorites.title: Sports
favorites.description: I enjoy fencing and dancing. I love ballet, contemporary, and hip-hop.

favorites.title: Movies
favorites.description: I'm a big fan of the movies 'Everything Everywhere All At Once' and 'La La Land.'

favorites.title: Music
favorites.description: I love listening to Keshi, Taylor Swift, Twice, Mitski, Tate Mcrae, and Joji.

favorites.title: Travel
favorites.description: I have a passion for traveling and exploring new cultures. My favorite destination so far is Japan.
